import React from "react" import { Form, Link, useSearchParams, useActionData } from "react-router-dom" import classes from "./AuthForm.module.css" function AuthForm() { const [searchParams] = useSearchParams() const isLogin = searchParams.get("mode") === "login" const data = useActionData() console.log(data) return ( <>

{isLogin ? "Log in" : "Create a new user"}

{data && data.error && data.error.Object.values.map((error) =>

{error}

)} {data && data.message &&

{data.message}

}

{isLogin ? "Create new user" : "Login"}
) } export default AuthForm
